text:
RSITY OF NEBRASKA ,TELEVISION
Lincoln 8, Nebraska
October 21, 1957
NAEB Headquarters
19 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Sirs:
I would appreciate it if you would send me a copy
of the research report concerning administrative policy
and production procedure of formal courses of instruction
on television recently prepared at Syracuse University
by James Sawyer and Charles Woodliff.
Thank you.
Lewis A. Rhodes

Producer for In-School Television
